msbt.message: The good news is you found it! The bad news is that time's up, so I can't let you keep itwhich kinda stinks.
Thanks for savin' me from having to pick it up, though. Hope you learned stuff for next time, !

There you are, !I sent you on that treasure hunt, but you never came back! I was NOT looking forward to explaining thatWhew! You're here. Now I can stop stalling with the others. Really good to see you again, !
